info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL PECOS AND SOUTHERN CRANE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southeast of Grandfalls, or 21 miles southwest of Crane, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Girvin, Cordona Lake and Imperial. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
